item.title: 在 workflowy 中显示 bilibili 和 Figma 预览的油猴脚本
item.description: // ==UserScript== // @name Workflowy Bilibili and Figma Embed // @namespace http://tampermonkey.net/ // @version 0.1 // @description Embed Bilibili videos and Figma files in Workflowy // @author You // @match https://workflowy.com/* // @grant none // ==/UserScript== (function() { 'use strict'; const bilibiliFormat = { regex: /https?:\/\/(www\.)?bilibili\.com\/video\/(BV[\w]+)\//i, embed: '//player.bilibili.com/player.html?bvid=$2&high_quality=1&autoplay=0' }; const figmaFormat = { regex: /https?:\/\/(www\.)?figma\.com\/(file|proto)\/([0-9a-zA-Z]+)(\/.*)?/i, embed: 'https://www.figma.com/embed?embed_host=share&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.figma.com%2F$2%2F$3&type=design&node-id=0%253A1&mode=design&t=p6zHLdZVkWzkR00Y-1' }; const checkForEmbeds = () => { document.querySelectorAll('a:not([data-processed])').forEach(a => { const url = a.

item.title: 在 workflowy 中显示 bilibili 预览的油猴脚本
item.description: // ==UserScript== // @name Workflowy Figma Embed // @namespace http://tampermonkey.net/ // @version 0.1 // @description Embed Figma files in Workflowy // @author You // @match https://workflowy.com/* // @grant none // ==/UserScript== (function() { 'use strict'; const figmaFormat = { regex: /https?:\/\/(www\.)?figma\.com\/(file|proto)\/([0-9a-zA-Z]+)(\/.*)?/i, embed: 'https://www.figma.com/embed?embed_host=share&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.figma.com%2F$2%2F$3' }; const checkForEmbeds = () => { document.querySelectorAll('a:not([data-processed])').forEach(a => { const url = a.href; const match = url.match(figmaFormat.regex); if (match) { const embedUrl = url.replace(figmaFormat.regex, figmaFormat.embed); const iframe = document.
